snippet: The Transportation Department said on Thursday that flights on the nation’s largest airlines arrived on time 77.7 percent of the time.
abstract: Transportation Dept reports that flights on nation's largest airlines arrived on time 77.7 percent of the time in August 2014, down from 78.8 percent in same period one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The Transportation Department said on Thursday that flights on the nation’s largest airlines arrived on time 77.7 percent of the time.

headline.main: On-Time Flight Performance Improved in August From July
headline.print_headline: On-Time Flight Performance Improved in August From July
